Interface IMergedFileManager

Interface with additional methods and properties of manager for merged file model.

Inheritance: IManager<T, TService> -> ICRUDManager<T, TService> -> IMergedFileManager

MergedFileManager
IMergedFile

Methods

Merge()

Merges appropriate files into one .md file specified by selected item.

void Merge()

Remarks

New file with specified path is created. If selected item has title set, file contains it. If created file is associated with any of the selected files connected with selected item, file is set as ignored. Next, all selected files connected with this merged file are retrieved. If selected item has table of content of type other then None, then appropriate table of content is appended to file. At last content of all files associated with retrieved selected files is consecutively appended at the end of created file.

Progress of the files merging is displayed in the console.
